headline: Will Honeywell (HON) Split Unlock Value or Complicate Its Sustainable Fuels Ambitions?
summary: Honeywell International recently announced a corporate restructuring to separate its automation and aerospace businesses, while also introducing a breakthrough renewable fuels technology that converts agricultural and forestry waste into marine fuel, gasoline, and sustainable aviation fuel for hard-to-abate sectors. This innovation not only targets decarbonization in the maritime industry but also enables cost-effective, high energy-density alternatives with prefabricated modular plant...
